mapper.select:
select A.to_bank_account as bankAccount, C.rule_lu_text as bankName, B.external_scheduled_protocol_id as scheduledProtocolId from to_trade_order A inner join of_order_fund B on A.to_order_id = B.to_order_id left join rule_lu_lookup C on C.rule_lu_type = 'EPAYBANK' and C.rule_lu_value = to_bank_code where A.to_trade_type = 'FIX' and external_scheduled_protocol_id in
#{item}
